sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya sudah biasa makan di sini.
english translation: "I am used to eating here."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Makanan ini sudah cukup.
english translation: "This food is enough."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya sudah pernah melihat film ini.
english translation: "I have ever seen this movie."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya suka makanan pedas.
english translation: "I like spicy food."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Anak saya suka sekali membaca buku.
english translation: "My child loves to read books."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Suku Batak tinggal di Sumatera Utara.
english translation: "The Batak tribe lives in North Sumatra."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Aku belajar supaya bisa lulus ujian.
english translation: "I study so that I can pass the exam."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya harus mengurus Surat Izin Mengemudi.
english translation: "I have to process the Driving License."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Ayah saya selalu membaca surat kabar setiap pagi.
english translation: "My father always reads the newspaper every morning."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya harus menulis surat lamaran untuk melamar pekerjaan.
english translation: "I have to write an application letter to apply for a job."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Anda harus membawa Surat Tanda Nomor Kendaraan saat berkendara.
english translation: "You must bring the Vehicle Registration Certificate when driving."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya bekerja di perusahaan swasta.
english translation: "I work at a private company."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Anak-anak tersebut harus taat kepada orang tua.
english translation: "Those children must be obedient to their parents."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Gadis itu menggunakan tablet untuk membaca buku.
english translation: "The girl uses a tablet to read books."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya melihatnya tadi di toko.
english translation: "I saw him earlier at the store."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kami menonton film tadi malam.
english translation: "We watched a movie last night."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya jogging tadi pagi.
english translation: "I went jogging this morning."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya makan siang tadi siang di restoran.
english translation: "I had lunch this afternoon at the restaurant."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kami merayakan Tahun Baru dengan kembang api.
english translation: "We celebrate New Year with fireworks."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya tidak tahu tahun berapa dia lahir.
english translation: "I don't know what year he was born."
